檇字的基本解释

檇
zuì
同“槜”。

檇字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zuì］
［《廣韻》將遂切，去至，精。］
［《廣韻》昨回切，平灰，從。］
［《廣韻》醉綏切，平脂，精。］
亦作“槜1”。亦作“欈2”。
见“檇李”。

檇字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檇； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页556第12
【唐韻】【集韻】?遵綏切，音嗺。【說文】以木有所擣也。　又【集韻】遵爲切，醉平聲。檇李，地名。【春秋·定十四年】越敗吳于檇李。【集韻】或作㰎。【韻會】或作雋。　又【唐韻】【韻會】?將遂切，音醉。公羊傳謂之醉李。今吳郡嘉興縣。

檇字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
檇字的起名意思

李子的一种。果皮鲜红，汁多味甜。浙江省檇李镇因盛产此果而得名。

wooden pestle

wooden pestle
zuì
Same as "槜".
wooden pestle
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zuì］
["Guangyun" will then cut, go to the end, fine. ]
["Guang Yun" cut back yesterday, flat gray, from. ]
["Guangyun" drunk and sui cut, flat fat, fine. ]
Also known as "槜1". Also known as "欈2".
See "Xiao Li".
wooden pestle
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　檇; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 556 No. 12
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Zun Sui cut, sound 嗺. [Said the text] There is something to do with wood.　 [Jiyun] Zun for cutting, drunk and flat sound. Li, the place name. [Spring and Autumn·Ding 14 years] The more defeated Wu Yumiao and Li. 【Ji Yun】or Zuo 㰎. 【Rhyme Meeting】Or Zuo Jun.　[Tang Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? Will cut, sound drunk. The ram is said to be the drunk plum. Jiaxing County, Wu County today.

wooden pestle
Name meaning
A kind of plum. The peel is bright red, juicy and sweet. The town of Miaoli in Zhejiang Province is named for its abundance of this fruit.
